calculations.name: Product Name Filter
calculations.formula: if [Parameters].[Product Name]="All" then 0 elseif [Parameters].[Product Name]= [Product Name]then 1 end

calculations.name: Current Quarter?
calculations.formula: datepart("quarter",[Close Date])=datepart("quarter", Date("5/31/2015")) and datepart("year",[Close Date])=datepart("year", Date("5/31/2015"))

calculations.name: Learn More
calculations.formula: "Click here to learn more about Tableau for Sales Analytics"

calculations.name: Today
calculations.formula:
Date("5/30/2015")
// We fixed today on 5/31/2015 in this sample since this is a static data set. In real time data, you can use today() instead.

measures.name: Opportunity Type Filter
measures.formula: if [Parameters].[Opportunity Type]="All" then 0 elseif [Parameters].[Opportunity Type]= [Opportunity Type]then 1 end
